divs: Sighting DetailsI lived at 25 Martha Eatonway, suite 2102 and this is where the event took place.the time can be closer tracked by rental records. first of all I do not drink (alchohol) or smoke. A few of us were hanging out at my place on this warm summer evening, when I noticed this very large ball of light outside the balcony window, I yelled for every one to look at this thing. I had the presence of mind to remove the screen as not to ipede my view of the light and stuck my head out the window. Rolin, Fred and myself all had our heads through that window in seconds. That light zoomed away from us in the direction of the Pearson Airport silently and disappeared within 6-7 mins.
trends: There have been 136 other sightings in Toronto
There were no other sightings in Toronto on or around June 30th 1990
